document.full_text: nearly 60 percent of americans would never support a republican presidential bid by former alaska governor sarah palin or real estate mogul and reality tv star donald trump, according to a new poll wednesday.
document.title: most u.s. voters say "no" to palin or trump in 2012
lines_and_colors: nearly 60 percent of americans would never support a republican presidential bid by former alaska governor sarah palin or real estate mogul and reality tv star donald trump, according to a new poll wednesday.
